dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 37 IS: Terminating the national emergency declared to impose duties on articles imported from Canada.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kaine (for himself, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Warner, Mr. Van Hollen, Mr. King, Mr. Whitehouse, and Mr. Coons) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: Terminating the national emergency declared to impose duties on articles imported from Canada.

section.text: That, pursuant to section 202 of the National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C. 1622), the national emergency declared on February 1, 2025, by the President in Executive Order 14193 (90 Fed. Reg. 9113) is terminated.
